posts.post_title: Wanted: T206 mike powers in high grade, or nice grade with b. Hindu
posts.post_content: Need either of these configurations.... Looking for a psa 7 or sgc 84 that can have common backs, or a solid grade (prefer 5's or higher) with brown hindu.....will pay top price in the market. Thanks
